description: Single storey rear and side (wraparound) extension
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings: 2133_E001 Rev 01 (Existing Ground Floor Plan), 2133_E002 Rev 01 (Existing First Floor Plan), 2133_E003 Rev 01 (Existing Front Elevation), 2133_E004 Rev 01 (Existing Rear Elevation), 2133_E006 Rev 01 (Existing Section), 2133_E007 Rev 01 (Existing Side Elevation), 2133_P001 Rev 02 (Proposed Ground Floor Plan OPTION C)	, 2133_P002 Rev 00 (Proposed First Floor Plan), 2133_P003 Rev 00 (Proposed Front Elevation UNCHANGED), 2133_P005 Rev 01 (Proposed Cross Section), 2133_P004 Rev 01 (Proposed Rear Elevation)_Draft/Options A&B) 2133_P006 Rev 00 (Existing Section), 2133_P007 Rev 01 (Proposed Side Elevation DRAFT/OPTION C), 2133_P008 Rev 00 (Location & Site Plan), and 2133_P009 Rev 01 (Location Plan).

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings listed under condition 2.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021). | The hereby approved rooflights to the flat roof of the extension shall not project more than 200mm from the plane of the roof when measured perpendicularly.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, and to safeguard the character and appearance of the area in accordance with policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and policies 7B and 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013). | No part of the roof of the extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policies D4 and D6 of The London Plan (2021), polices 7.4, 7A & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and polices 1.1 (e)(g), 1.2 (f), 2.1(c) and 2.10 Core Strategy (2012).
